description:
Move ahead of ERP !

This course explains on the concepts of Business Warehouse in a simple way. An elaborate discussion on the electronic-board is done on the practical aspects happening in corporate. Strategy Management concepts and applications are made simple for students to grasp.

The concepts and business flows have been explained using SAP as a reference and can be applied to any such similar systems and solutions. Simple flow in MS Excel with dashboards is shown at the end of the course.

This course is for MBA / Management students having ERP as an elective in their academic course curriculum.

Self-Assessments have been given as part of the course for students to practice on their own to apply their understandings from this course.
title: MBA Students! Learn beyond ERP
